ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Poll results for eqbards
ygData.msgSnippet: Lol! Well Safe Fall didn t protect me from my own stupidity of trying to chat while twisting Accelerando and Agilmente s Aria in Dreadlands. I was so high up
ygData.messageBody:
Lol! Well Safe Fall didn't protect me from my own stupidity of trying to
chat while twisting Accelerando and Agilmente's Aria in Dreadlands. I was
so high up and I had time to attempt to restart Agilmente's and it would
have worked, had I not still been in "chat" mode.

But I do love jumping from the Kelethin platforms that got me killed as a
newbie. :-P

Thanks Talies, I didn't see that additional qualifier in the poll. Without
safe fall, the newbies in the nro zone would just hear a"ow, ouch, OUCH,
OW, ouch, ow" (note doppler affect) throughout their zone as a bard goes
dune hopping. :-)

My favorite is announcing that something is "on track" and having other's
say, "Geez, you get that too?"

---Windleaf Mistsong



At 02:09 PM 9/12/00 -0600, Kimes, Dean W. wrote:

>Hah! Those tiny potholes are nothing compared to the one I fell into in
>Warslik's. Luckily I landed on a giant Lizard statue, but I still took 400
>points. Scary thing was, where I landed couldn't have been more than a
>third of the way to the bottom.
>
> Kit
>
>---------------------------------------------------------------------_->
>
>SFA Meetings
>Hi my name is Minkin, and i have a Safe Fall Addiction, i can't help it, i
>have this problem with running slow, i need speed, i speed whereever i go
>and i'm an avid jumper of cliffs *gasp from the crowd*
>
>*crowd*:Hi Minkin... Welcome to SFA
>
>ok im bored at work, and well i do have SFA, i love SF, and wish it would
>cap even higher, those dreadland drops are really mean to go over!
>
>Minkin/Rakka
>Sol ro
>
>
>
>
> >Are you able to hotkey Safe Fall? I use this skill just by falling off
> >things, not by pressing a hot key for it.
>
>
>Nah - you'll notice it also mentioned "can't live without" - my guess is, a
>lot of Bards have problems with cliffs ;)
>
>Talies
